admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The broad objective of the Financial
            Sector Adjustment Loan Project is to strengthen the
            financial system, particularly the commercial banking
            segment. More specifically, the loan: (i) strengthen the
            supervision and regulatory framework for commercial banks;
            (ii) improve the institutional arrangement for depositor
            protection; (iii) reduce intermediation costs in the banking
            system; (iv) improve the institutional framework for the
            mobilization and delivery of long-term credit.
